example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to define the table format.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:TableAdv> <!-- Define the table format. --> <RichTextBoxAdv:TableAdv.TableFormat> <RichTextBoxAdv:TableFormat Background="#FFFF0000" LeftIndent="24"/> </RichTextBoxAdv:TableAdv.TableFormat> <RichTextBoxAdv:TableRowAdv> <RichTextBoxAdv:TableCellAdv> <RichTextBoxAdv:TableCellAdv.CellFormat> <RichTextBoxAdv:CellFormat CellWidth="200"/> </RichTextBoxAdv:TableCellAdv.CellFormat> <RichTextBoxAdv:ParagraphAdv> <RichTextBoxAdv:SpanAdv>First cell in first row.</RichTextBoxAdv:SpanAdv> </RichTextBoxAdv:ParagraphAdv> </RichTextBoxAdv:TableCellAdv> </RichTextBoxAdv:TableRowAdv> </RichTextBoxAdv:TableAdv>

' Initialize a table. Dim tableAdv As New TableAdv()
' Define the table format. Dim tableFormat As New TableFormat() tableFormat.Background = Color.FromArgb(&HFF, &HFF, &H0, &H0) tableFormat.LeftIndent = 24 tableAdv.TableFormat = tableFormat
' Initialize a row. Dim tableRowAdv As New TableRowAdv() ' Initialize a table cell. Dim tableCellAdv As New TableCellAdv() tableCellAdv.CellFormat.CellWidth = 200 ' Initializes a paragraph. Dim paragraphAdv As New ParagraphAdv() Dim spanAdv As New SpanAdv() spanAdv.Text = "First cell in first row." paragraphAdv.Inlines.Add(spanAdv) tableCellAdv.Blocks.Add(paragraphAdv) tableRowAdv.Cells.Add(tableCellAdv) tableAdv.Rows.Add(tableRowAdv)

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to define a table cell.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:TableCellAdv> <RichTextBoxAdv:TableCellAdv.CellFormat> <RichTextBoxAdv:CellFormat CellWidth="200"/> </RichTextBoxAdv:TableCellAdv.CellFormat> <RichTextBoxAdv:ParagraphAdv> <RichTextBoxAdv:SpanAdv>First cell in first row.</RichTextBoxAdv:SpanAdv> </RichTextBoxAdv:ParagraphAdv> <!-- Add any number of blocks to the table cell. --> </RichTextBoxAdv:TableCellAdv>

' Initialize a table cell. Dim tableCellAdv As New TableCellAdv() tableCellAdv.CellFormat.CellWidth = 200 ' Initializes a paragraph. Dim paragraphAdv As New ParagraphAdv() Dim spanAdv As New SpanAdv() spanAdv.Text = "First cell in first row." paragraphAdv.Inlines.Add(spanAdv) tableCellAdv.Blocks.Add(paragraphAdv) ' Add any number of blocks to the table cell.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to add table cells.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:TableRowAdv> <RichTextBoxAdv:TableCellAdv> <RichTextBoxAdv:TableCellAdv.CellFormat> <RichTextBoxAdv:CellFormat CellWidth="200"/> </RichTextBoxAdv:TableCellAdv.CellFormat> <RichTextBoxAdv:ParagraphAdv> <RichTextBoxAdv:SpanAdv>First cell in first row.</RichTextBoxAdv:SpanAdv> </RichTextBoxAdv:ParagraphAdv> </RichTextBoxAdv:TableCellAdv> <!-- Add any number of table cells. --> </RichTextBoxAdv:TableRowAdv>

' Initialize a row. Dim tableRowAdv As New TableRowAdv() ' Initialize a table cell. Dim tableCellAdv As New TableCellAdv() tableCellAdv.CellFormat.CellWidth = 200 ' Initializes a paragraph. Dim paragraphAdv As New ParagraphAdv() Dim spanAdv As New SpanAdv() spanAdv.Text = "First cell in first row." paragraphAdv.Inlines.Add(spanAdv) tableCellAdv.Blocks.Add(paragraphAdv) tableRowAdv.Cells.Add(tableCellAdv) ' Add any number of cells to the row.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to replace an existing text using text search in .
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv"/>

Public Sub ReplaceText()
' Performs case sensitive search for the text "colour" that also matches whole word in the document. Dim textSearchResult As TextSearchResult = richTextBoxAdv.Find("colour", FindOptions.CaseSensitiveWholeWord)
' If any text search result found, replace it with the text "color". If textSearchResult IsNot Nothing Then textSearchResult.Replace("color") End If
End Sub

Public Sub ReplaceFirstOccurrenceOfText()

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.SpellingError.IgnoreAll
member.summary: Ignores all the occurrences of a misspelled word in a control.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to ignore all occurrences of a misspelled word in a control.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv" xmlns:System="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:RichTextBoxAdv="clr-namespace:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv;assembly=Syncfusion.SfRichTextBoxAdv.Wpf"> <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.SpellChecker> <!-- Enables spell checking functionality. --> <RichTextBoxAdv:SpellChecker IsEnabled="True" IgnoreAlphaNumericWords="True" IgnoreURIs="True" IgnoreUppercaseWords="False"> <RichTextBoxAdv:SpellChecker.CustomDictionaries> <!-- Defines the custom dictionaries for spell checking. --> <System:String>../../Assets/Default.dic</System:String> </RichTextBoxAdv:SpellChecker.CustomDictionaries> </RichTextBoxAdv:SpellChecker> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.SpellChecker> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv>

Public Sub IgnoreSpellingError() Dim textPosition As TextPosition = richTextBoxAdv.Document.GetTextPosition("0;0;20") ' Gets the spelling error at the specified text position. Dim spellingError As Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.SpellingError = richTextBoxAdv.GetSpellingError(textPosition) If spellingError IsNot Nothing Then ' If a spelling error is found, ignores all the occurrences of the misspelled word. spellingError.IgnoreAll() End If End Sub

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.SpellingError.Correct(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces the misspelled word in a control with the specified correction text .
member.param: The correction text to replace the misspelled word in a control.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to correct a misspelled word in a control.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv" xmlns:System="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:RichTextBoxAdv="clr-namespace:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv;assembly=Syncfusion.SfRichTextBoxAdv.Wpf"> <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.SpellChecker> <!-- Enables spell checking functionality. --> <RichTextBoxAdv:SpellChecker IsEnabled="True" IgnoreAlphaNumericWords="True" IgnoreURIs="True" IgnoreUppercaseWords="False"> <RichTextBoxAdv:SpellChecker.CustomDictionaries> <!-- Defines the custom dictionaries for spell checking. --> <System:String>../../Assets/Default.dic</System:String> </RichTextBoxAdv:SpellChecker.CustomDictionaries> </RichTextBoxAdv:SpellChecker> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.SpellChecker> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv>

Public Sub CorrectSpellingError() Dim textPosition As TextPosition = richTextBoxAdv.Document.GetTextPosition("0;0;20") ' Gets the spelling error at the specified text position. Dim spellingError As Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.SpellingError = richTextBoxAdv.GetSpellingError(textPosition) If spellingError IsNot Nothing AndAlso spellingError.Suggestions.Count() > 0 Then ' If a spelling error is found, corrects the misspelled word. spellingError.Correct(spellingError.Suggestions.ElementAt(0)) End If End Sub

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.SpellChecker
member.summary: Provides real-time spell checking functionality to a control.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to enable spell checking functionality in a control.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv" xmlns:System="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:RichTextBoxAdv="clr-namespace:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv;assembly=Syncfusion.SfRichTextBoxAdv.Wpf"> <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.SpellChecker> <!-- Enables spell checking functionality. --> <RichTextBoxAdv:SpellChecker IsEnabled="True" IgnoreAlphaNumericWords="True" IgnoreURIs="True" IgnoreUppercaseWords="False"> <RichTextBoxAdv:SpellChecker.CustomDictionaries> <!-- Defines the custom dictionaries for spell checking. --> <System:String>../../Assets/Default.dic</System:String> </RichTextBoxAdv:SpellChecker.CustomDictionaries> </RichTextBoxAdv:SpellChecker> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.SpellChecker> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv>

' Defines the control. Dim richTextBoxAdv As New Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.SfRichTextBoxAdv()
' Enables the spell checking functionality. Dim spellChecker As New SpellChecker() spellChecker.IsEnabled = True spellChecker.IgnoreAlphaNumericWords = True spellChecker.IgnoreURIs = True spellChecker.IgnoreUppercaseWords = False ' Defines the custom dictionaries for spell checking. spellChecker.CustomDictionaries.Add("../../Assets/Default.dic")
richTextBoxAdv.SpellChecker = spellChecker

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.SpellChecker.UseFrameworkSpellCheck
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use framework built-in spell checker in control. Default value is True.
member.value: If True, uses Microsoft built-in spell checker. Otherwise, uses custom spell checker of SfRichTextBoxAdv control.
member.remarks: Microsoft built-in spell checker is supported only when WPF provides a default dictionary. It provides dictionaries only for English, French, German, and Spanish languages. So, add custom dictionaries for other languages or use custom spell checker of SfRichTextBoxAdv control by setting UseFrameworkSpellCheck property as false.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.SelectionRangeCollection.Add(Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.TextPosition,Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.TextPosition)
member.summary: Adds the specified start and end as a instance to the .
member.exception: TextPosition cannot be null.
Invalid start TextPosition.
Invalid end TextPosition.
A text position within comment can be selected with another text position within the same comment only.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to add the specified start and end positions to the selection range collection.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv"/>

Public Sub AddSelection()
' Retrieves the position at the first paragraph start. Dim startPosition As TextPosition = richTextBoxAdv.Document.GetTextPosition("0;0;0")
' Retrieves the position at offset = 20 in the first paragraph. Dim endPosition As TextPosition = richTextBoxAdv.Document.GetTextPosition("0;0;20")
' Selects the text positions in forward direction. richTextBoxAdv.Selection.Select(startPosition, endPosition)
' Retrieves the position at offset = 1 in the third paragraph. Dim secondStartPosition As TextPosition = richTextBoxAdv.Document.GetTextPosition("0;2;1")
' Retrieves the position at offset = 16 in the fifth paragraph. Dim secondEndPosition As TextPosition = richTextBoxAdv.Document.GetTextPosition("0;4;16")
' Adds the second start position and second end position to the selection ranges. richTextBoxAdv.Selection.SelectionRanges.Add(secondStartPosition, secondEndPosition)
End Sub

member.summary: Removes all the instances from the .

Public Sub ClearSelection()

End Sub

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.SelectionAdv.Select(Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.TextPosition,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Selects the content within the specified text position.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.SelectionAdv.Select(Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.TextPosition,Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.TextPosition)
member.summary: Selects the specified start and end .
member.param: The instance that denotes the start position of the .
The instance that denotes the end position of the .
member.exception: TextPosition cannot be null.
Invalid start TextPosition.
Invalid end TextPosition.
A text position within comment can be selected with another text position within the same comment only.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to select the specified start and end position.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv"/>

Public Sub SelectContents()
' Retrieves the position at the first paragraph start. Dim startPosition As TextPosition = richTextBoxAdv.Document.GetTextPosition("0;0;0")
' Retrieves the position at offset = 20 in the first paragraph. Dim endPosition As TextPosition = richTextBoxAdv.Document.GetTextPosition("0;0;20")
' Selects the text positions in forward direction. richTextBoxAdv.Selection.Select(startPosition, endPosition)
' Selects the text positions in reverse direction. ' richTextBoxAdv.Selection.Select(endPosition, startPosition)
' To make an empty selection at the specific text position. ' richTextBoxAdv.Selection.Select(startPosition, startPosition)
End Sub

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.SelectionAdv.Delete
member.summary: Deletes the selected content in control
member.returns: Returns true if the selected content is deleted. Otherwise false
member.remarks: This method is valid only when the selection is non-empty. It deletes the selected content, like Delete key. For example, when some cells of a table or an entire table is selected it deletes only the cell contents.

example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv"/>

Public Sub InsertTextAtSelection()
' Inserts the specified text at current selection position. ' If the current selection is not empty, removes the selected contents first and then inserts the text. richTextBoxAdv.Selection.InsertText("Hello world")
End Sub

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.SelectionAdv.InsertUIContainer(System.Windows.UIElement,System.Double,System.Double)

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to insert the at the current selection.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv"/>

Public Sub InsertUIElementAtSelection()
' Inserts the specified button control at current selection position. ' If the current selection is not empty, removes the selected contents first and then inserts the button. Dim button As Button = New Button() button.Content = "Click Me!" richTextBoxAdv.Selection.InsertUIContainer(button, 30, 30) End Sub

member.param: The display width of the UIElement.
The display height of the UIElement.
member.exception: UIElement cannot be null.
Width should not be negative or infinity value.
Height should not be negative or infinity value.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.SelectionParagraphFormat.GetList
member.summary: Gets the applied for the selected paragraphs.
member.returns: Returns the instance, if same list is applied for the selected paragraphs. Otherwise returns null.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieves the list for selected paragraphs.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv"/>

Public Sub GetList()
' Retrieves the list applied for the selected paragraphs. ListAdv listAdv = richTextBoxAdv.Selection.ParagraphFormat.GetList()
If listAdv IsNot Nothing Then ' Retrieves the first list level in the list Dim listLevelAdv As ListLevelAdv = listAdv.AbstractList.Levels(0) ' Sets the list level pattern as upper case letters. listLevelAdv.ListLevelPattern = ListLevelPattern.UpLetter ' Modifies the number format for the list level. listLevelAdv.NumberFormat = "Section.%1" ' Modifies the start at value for the list level. listLevelAdv.StartAt = 1 ' Modifies the character format for the list level. listLevelAdv.CharacterFormat.FontFamily = New FontFamily("Arial")
' Sets the list. This will modify the existing list. richTextBoxAdv.Selection.ParagraphFormat.SetList(listAdv) End If End Sub

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.SelectionParagraphFormat.SetList(Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.ListAdv)
member.summary: Sets the specified for the selected paragraphs.
member.param: The to be applied for the selected paragraphs.
member.remarks: If the specifed is null, then list will be cleared for the selected paragraphs. Else if the selected paragraph has list, then the existing will get modified with the specified see cref="ListAdv"/>. Otherwise the specified will be applied for the selected paragraphs.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to apply list for the selected paragraphs.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv"/>

Public Sub SetList()
' Initializes a new abstract list. Dim abstractListAdv As New AbstractListAdv(Nothing) abstractListAdv.AbstractListId = 4
' Defines a new list level. Dim listLevel As New ListLevelAdv(abstractListAdv) listLevel.ParagraphFormat.LeftIndent = 48d listLevel.ParagraphFormat.FirstLineIndent = 24d listLevel.FollowCharacter = FollowCharacterType.Tab listLevel.ListLevelPattern = ListLevelPattern.LowLetter listLevel.NumberFormat = "(%1.)" listLevel.RestartLevel = 0 listLevel.StartAt = 1 ' Adds list level to abstract list. abstractListAdv.Levels.Add(listLevel)
' Creates a new list instance. Dim listAdv As New ListAdv(Nothing) listAdv.AbstractList = abstractListAdv listAdv.AbstractListId = abstractListAdv.AbstractListId listAdv.ListId = 4
' If the selected paragraph has list, then modifies the list. ' Else the list will be added to the document and applied for the selected paragraphs. richTextBoxAdv.Selection.ParagraphFormat.SetList(listAdv) End Sub

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.TextPosition.IsAtSamePosition(Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.TextPosition)
member.summary: Identifies whether the specified denotes the same position as this .
member.param: A instance that denotes a position to compare to this instance.
member.returns: True, if this instance and the specified both denotes the same position. Otherwise False.
member.exception: The textPosition cannot be null.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to identify whether two text positions denotes the same position.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv"/>

Public Function IsAtSamePosition() As Boolean Dim position1 As TextPosition = richTextBoxAdv.Document.GetTextPosition("0;0;0")
Dim paragraph As ParagraphAdv = TryCast(richTextBoxAdv.Document.Sections(0).Blocks(0), ParagraphAdv) Dim position2 As TextPosition = richTextBoxAdv.Document.GetTextPosition(paragraph, 0)
If position1.IsAtSamePosition(position2) Then Return True End If
Return False End Function

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.TextPosition.IsInSameDocument(Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.TextPosition)
member.summary: Identifies whether the specified see cref="TextPosition"/> lies in the same document as this .
member.param: A instance that denotes a position to compare to this instance.
member.returns: True, if this instance and the specified both lies in the same document. Otherwise False.
member.exception: The textPosition cannot be null.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to identify whether two text positions lies in the same document.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv"/>

Public Function IsInSameDocument() As Boolean Dim position1 As TextPosition = richTextBoxAdv.Document.GetTextPosition("0;4;2")
Dim paragraph As ParagraphAdv = TryCast(richTextBoxAdv.Document.Sections(0).Blocks(0), ParagraphAdv) Dim position2 As TextPosition = richTextBoxAdv.Document.GetTextPosition(paragraph, 0)
If position1.IsInSameDocument(position2) Then Return True End If
Return False End Function

member.name: M:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.TextPosition.MoveToLineEnd
member.summary: Moves the to the end of the line.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to select a line by moving the text position to the end of the line.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv"/>

Public Sub SelectLine() ' Retrieves the text position at the specified hierarchical position. Dim startTextPosition As TextPosition = richTextBoxAdv.Document.GetTextPosition("0;3;16") If startTextPosition Is Nothing Then Return End If ' Moves the text position to the beginning of the line. startTextPosition.MoveToLineStart() ' Initialize a new text position and moves it to the end of the line. Dim endTextPosition As TextPosition = richTextBoxAdv.Document.GetTextPosition(startTextPosition.GetHierarchicalIndex) endTextPosition.MoveToLineEnd() ' Selects the line. richTextBoxAdv.Selection.[Select](startTextPosition, endTextPosition) End Sub

Dim endTextPosition As TextPosition = richTextBoxAdv.Document.GetTextPosition(startTextPosition.GetHierarchicalIndex) endTextPosition.MoveToLineEnd() ' Selects the line. richTextBoxAdv.Selection.[Select](startTextPosition, endTextPosition) End Sub

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.LoadAsyncSettings
member.summary: Represents the asynchronous document loading settings for the control .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.LoadAsyncSettings.InitialPageLoadCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of pages to be loaded initially during asynchronous document loading operation.
member.value: The number of pages to be loaded initially during asynchronous document loading operation. The Default value is 5.
member.remarks: This property will have impact only in Pages layout type.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to define asynchronous loading settings for a control.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv" LayoutType="Pages"> <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.LoadAsyncSettings> <!-- Defines page loading settings --> <RichTextBoxAdv:LoadAsyncSettings InitialPageLoadCount="2" IncrementalPageLoadCount="1" /> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.LoadAsyncSettings> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv>

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.LoadAsyncSettings.InitialPageLoadCountProperty
member.returns: The identifier for the InitialPageLoadCount dependency property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.LoadAsyncSettings.IncrementalPageLoadCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of pages to be incrementally loaded after initial pages loaded, during asynchronous document loading operation.
member.value: The number of pages to be incrementally loaded after initial pages loaded, during asynchronous document loading operation. The Default value is 3.
member.remarks: This property will have impact only in Pages layout type.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to define asynchronous loading settings for a control.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv" LayoutType="Pages"> <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.LoadAsyncSettings> <!-- Defines page loading settings --> <RichTextBoxAdv:LoadAsyncSettings InitialPageLoadCount="2" IncrementalPageLoadCount="1" /> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.LoadAsyncSettings> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv>

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.LoadAsyncSettings.IncrementalPageLoadCountProperty
member.returns: The identifier for the IncrementalPageLoadCount dependency property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.LoadAsyncSettings.ShowPageNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the loading page number popup is visible in the control. The default value is true.
member.value: True, if loading page number popup is visible; Otherwise false.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to define asynchronous loading settings for a control.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv" LayoutType="Pages"> <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.LoadAsyncSettings> <!-- Defines page loading settings --> <RichTextBoxAdv:LoadAsyncSettings ShowPageNumber="false" /> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.LoadAsyncSettings> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv>

/// ' Defines the control. Dim richTextBoxAdv As New SfRichTextBoxAdv()
'Defines the asycnhronous loading settings. richTextBoxAdv.LoadAsyncSettings.ShowPageNumber = false

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.LoadAsyncSettings.ShowPageNumberProperty
member.returns: The identifier for the ShowPageNumber dependency property.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings
member.summary: Represents the common editing settings for the control .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings.IsUndoEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether undo support is enabled for the control.
member.returns: True if the undo support is enabled;otherwise, false. The default value is true.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to enable or disable undo support in control.
example.code: <!-- Defines the SfRichTextBoxAdv control with undo operation disabled. --> <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv"> <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings> <!-- Defines editor settings with undo operation disabled --> <RichTextBoxAdv:EditorSettings IsUndoEnabled="False" /> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv>
' Defines the SfRichTextBoxAdv control with undo operation disabled. Dim richTextBoxAdv As New SfRichTextBoxAdv() richTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings.IsUndoEnabled = false

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings.IsUndoEnabledProperty
member.returns: The identifier for the IsUndoEnabled dependency property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings.CanUndoStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicates whether the undo support is enabled for the in the control.
member.returns: True if the undo support is enabled for the ;otherwise, false. The default value is true.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to enable or disable style undo support in control.
example.code: <!-- Defines the SfRichTextBoxAdv control with undo style operation disabled. --> <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv"> <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings> <!-- Defines editor settings with undo style operation disabled --> <RichTextBoxAdv:EditorSettings CanUndoStyle="False" /> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv>
' Defines the SfRichTextBoxAdv control with style undo operation disabled. Dim richTextBoxAdv As New SfRichTextBoxAdv() richTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings.CanUndoStyle = false

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings.CanUndoStyleProperty
member.returns: The identifier for the CanUndoStyle dependency property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings.ResizingMode
member.summary: A enumeration value that specifies when the element being resized should be redrawn.
member.remarks: This property is to control whether a element is redrawn dynamically during the resizing operation (the value), or the element is redrawn after the resizing operation is finished (the value).

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to define editor settings for a control.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv" LayoutType="Pages"> <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings> <!-- Defines editor settings with live resizing --> <RichTextBoxAdv:EditorSettings ResizingMode="Live" /> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv>

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings.ResizingModeProperty
member.returns: The identifier for the ResizingMode dependency property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings.IsInElementHost
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is hosted in Windows Forms application using ElementHost control.
member.remarks: This property enables compatibility of Input Method Editor (IME) in Windows Forms application. It is applicable only when the WPF SfRichTextBoxAdv control is hosted in Windows Forms application using ElementHost control and not applicable for WPF application.

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to define editor settings for a control.
example.code: <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv x:Name="richTextBoxAdv" LayoutType="Pages"> <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings> <!-- Defines the editor settings indicating the control is hosted in Windows Forms application using ElementHost control --> <RichTextBoxAdv:EditorSettings IsInElementHost="True" /> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv>

member.name: F:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.EditorSettings.IsInElementHostProperty
member.returns: The identifier for the IsInElementHost dependency property.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Windows.Controls.RichTextBoxAdv.ExportSettings.OptimizeRtfFileSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to reduce the resultant RTF file size by removing the tags with default values. The default value is false.
member.value: true to reduce the resultant RTF file size, like WordPad application, RichTextBox control; otherwise, false

example.para: The following code example demonstrates how to set the OptimizeRtfFileSize property.
example.code: <!-- Sets the OptimizeRtfFileSize. --> <RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.ExportSettings> <RichTextBoxAdv:ExportSettings OptimizeRtfFileSize="True"/> </RichTextBoxAdv:SfRichTextBoxAdv.ExportSettings>
' Sets the OptimizeRtfFileSize. Dim richTextBoxAdv As New SfRichTextBoxAdv() richTextBoxAdv.ExportSettings.OptimizeRtfFileSize = True
